content: Harborview's oncology department report shows increased use of localized cryotherapy among elderly sarcoma patients since Q3 2023. 38% of cases involved Medicare Advantage plans requiring pre-approval under Policy #CT-8821. Researchers observed 22% reduction in tumor size for patients completing â‰¥4 sessions. Study coordinator Dr. Ellen Park can be reached at epark@harborviewmed.org for data queries.
